tasks.label: Login and fetch all todos via FastAPI
tasks.command: curl -X POST "http://127.0.0.1:8000/token" -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" -d "username=samuel&password=samuel" -c cookies.txt > token_response.json && set TOKEN=$(jq -r .access_token token_response.json) && curl -X GET "http://127.0.0.1:8000/todos" -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"
